COL.MC.summary: Colonial is a Spanish listed REIT company (SOCIMI), leader in the European Prime office market with presence in the main business areas of Barcelona, Madrid and Paris with a prime office portfolio of more than one million of sqm of GLA and assets under management with a value of more than Â12bn.

DOMO.MC.summary: Domo Activos, S.A., a real estate investment company, purchases, constructs, sells, and rents real estate properties in Spain. It establishes and manages investment vehicles; provides advisory services for purchase or sale of assets, as well as rent or sale of real estate properties; manages asset portfolios; supervises or manages buildings and their facilities; and administration, relationship with the tenants, collections, repairs, etc. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

ISUR.MC.summary: Inmobiliaria del Sur, S.A. operates as a real estate company in Spain. It constructs and sells houses; offers offices and commercial premises; and rents car parks. The company was incorporated in 1945 and is headquartered in Seville, Spain.

L8E.F.long_name: Lar España Real Estate SOCIMI, S.A.
L8E.F.summary: LAR ESPAÃA REAL ESTATE SOCIMI, SA is a company listed on the Spanish Stock Exchanges, constituted SOCIMI "Sociedad AnÃ³nima Quizada de InversiÃ³n en el Mercado Inmobiliario" in March 2014. LIB.MC.summary: Libertas 7, S.A. engages in the real estate and investment businesses in Spain. It is involved in the development of residential houses under the FICSA brand. The company also manages the apartments located in Port Saplaya, and Sea You Port Valencia hotel located in Valencia for the tourist market. In addition, it invests in listed and unlisted companies, and equities, as well as in regulated markets. Libertas 7, S.A. was founded in 1946 and is headquartered in Valencia, Spain.

MEQA.F.summary: MERLIN Properties SOCIMI, SA, one of the main real estate companies listed on the Spanish Stock Exchange (IBEX-35), has as its main activity the acquisition and management of tertiary real estate assets in the Iberian Peninsula. The Company is a public limited company incorporated as a SOCIMI. The main activity of the Company is the acquisition, active management, operation and selective rotation of quality commercial real estate assets in the investment segment ÂCoreÂ and ÂCore PlusÂ, mainly in Spain and, to a lesser extent, in Portugal. The Company focuses on the office, retail and logistics market.

MTB.MC.summary: Montebalito, S.A. engages in real estate and renewable energy businesses in Sweden and internationally. It develops and rents properties; and provides land management services. The company also develops and manages photovoltaic parks. Montebalito, S.A. was founded in 1972 and is based in Madrid, Spain. The company is a subsidiary of Metambiente, S.A.

NYE.MC.summary: Nyesa Valores CorporaciÃ³n, S.A. develops real estate projects in Spain and internationally. It develops residential, industrial, offices, hotels, and commercial spaces. The company also engages in the urban development activities and acquisition of real estate assets. Nyesa Valores CorporaciÃ³n, S.A. was founded in 1950 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

QBT.MC.summary: Quabit Inmobiliaria, S.A., a real estate company, engages in the real estate development and land management businesses in Spain. It also manages residential and commercial properties, offices, warehouses, and hotels. The company is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

RBS.F.summary: Realia Business, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in property, and development and land businesses in Spain and internationally. It leases and manages office buildings and shopping centers; develops and sells real estate properties primarily homes; and provides land management. It has a land portfolio of 5,752,433 gross square meters and 1,619,033 square meters of buildable land. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

REN.MC.summary: Renta CorporaciÃ³n Real Estate, S.A. engages in the acquisition, refurbishment, and sale of real estate properties in the cities of Barcelona and Madrid. The company's property portfolio comprises residential buildings, offices, and parking spaces, as well as commercial premises and hotels. It serves individuals, companies, institutions, and real estate agents. Renta CorporaciÃ³n Real Estate, S.A. was founded in 1991 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

RLIA.MC.summary: Realia Business, S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in property, and development and land businesses in Spain and internationally. It leases and manages office buildings and shopping centers; develops and sells real estate properties primarily homes; and provides land management. It has a land portfolio of 5,752,433 gross square meters and 1,619,033 square meters of buildable land. The company was incorporated in 1997 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

UBS.MC.summary: Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. engages in the real estate business in Spain. It develops and sells properties; manages and sells land; and leases properties. The company was formerly known as Urbas Guadahermosa SA. and changed its name to Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. in September 2011. Urbas Grupo Financiero, S.A. was founded in 1944 and is based in Guadalajara, Spain.

YADV.MC.summary: Advero Properties Socimi S.A. engages in the rental of housing in middle-income areas in Spain. The company was founded in 2017 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YAPS.MC.summary: Albirana Properties SOCIMI, S.A.U. operates as a real estate investment company in Spain and internationally. The company acquires and develops real estate assets. Its rental properties comprise apartments, houses, business premises, warehouses, offices, garages, and storage spaces. The company is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YCPS.MC.summary: As of December 20, 2016, Castellana Properties Socimi, S.A. (BME:YCPS) operates as a subsidiary of Vukile Property Fund Limited.

YDES.MC.long_name: Desarrollos Ermita del Santo, SOCIMI, S.A.
YDES.MC.summary: Desarrollos Ermita Del Santo Socimi, S.A. owns the La Ermita Shopping Center in Madrid, Spain. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YEIS.MC.summary: As of August 29, 2017, Socimi Eurosic Investment Spain operates as a subsidiary of Batipart SAS.

YENT.MC.summary: Entrecampos Cuatro, Socimi, S.A. operates as a real estate investment trust that engages in the leasing of real estate properties in Spain and Germany. The company was formerly known as Entrecampos Cuatro, S.L. and changed its name to Entrecampos Cuatro, Socimi, S.A. in May 2013. Entrecampos Cuatro, Socimi, S.A. was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

YGGC.MC.long_name: General de Galerías Comerciales SOCIMI, S.A.
YGGC.MC.summary: General de GalerÃ­as Comerciales Socimi, S.A. promotes, constructs, and manages various commercial complexes in Andalusia and Catalonia. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YGMP.MC.summary: Gmp Property SOCIMI, S.A. invests, acquires, develops, and manages offices, shopping centers and commercial premises, industrial buildings, and logistics centers in Spain. The company rents and sells luxury villas, apartments, and plots of land. It is also involved in the land acquisition and management; property management; and residential tourism development activities. In addition, the company provides a range of sports and leisure services; and accommodation facilities, as well as develops and renovates existing buildings. Further, it operates restaurants; and an 18-hole championship golf course and country club, as well as offers Internet services. GMP Property SOCIMI, S.A. was founded in 1979 and is headquartered in Madrid, Spain.

YGOP.MC.summary: Grupo Ortiz Properties SOCIMI, S.A. engages in managing and leasing real estate assets in Spain. Its portfolio consists of 100,000 square meters for rent that compose of various categories of assets, such as housing, office buildings, commercial premises, warehouses, service stations, and parking areas. The company is based in Madrid, Spain. Grupo Ortiz Properties SOCIMI, S.A. is a subsidiary of Ortiz Construcciones y Proyectos, S.A.

YHSP.MC.summary: Hispanotels Inversiones Socimi S.A. invests in the hotel, office, residential, and commercial real estate markets. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YINM.MC.summary: Inmofam 99 Socimi, S.A., an investment company, engages in the rental of real estate properties in Madrid. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YMEI.MC.summary: Mercal Inmuebles Socimi, S.A. is engaged in leasing and managing real estate properties. Its portfolio consists of stores, offices, hospitals, land, and garages. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YMPI.MC.summary: Mistral Patrimonio Inmobiliario Socimi S.A. owns and leases residential properties in Spain. It operates a portfolio of 11 residential properties, including 3 free housing properties in Alicante, Palma de Mallorca, and Pontevedra; and 8 housing of official protection in Albacete, Gerona, Navarra, and Seville. The company was incorporated in 2016 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

YNUM.MC.long_name: Numulae Gestión de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A.
YNUM.MC.summary: Numulae GestiÃ³n de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A. operates as a real estate company in Spain. The company operates 35 commercial premises, 9 kiosks, and 3 terraces distributed over a total area of 6,978.25 m2 located in the El ArcÃ¡ngel Shopping Center, CÃ³rdoba. Numulae GestiÃ³n de Servicios SOCIMI, S.A. is based in Madrid, Spain.

YORS.MC.summary: Optimum RE Spain, SOCIMI, S.A. operates in the real estate investment trust business. The company is incorporated in 2014 and is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YPARK.MC.long_name: Inmobiliaria Park Rose Iberoamericana SOCIMI, S.A.
YPARK.MC.summary: Inmobiliaria Park Rose Iberoamericana SOCIMI, S.A. engages in leasing of commercial properties and office buildings in Spain and the United States. The company is based in Barcelona, Spain.

YTRA.MC.summary: Trajano Iberia Socimi, S.A. is a real estate investment trust. Trajano Iberia Socimi, S.A. is based in Madrid, Spain.

YVIT.MC.summary: Vitruvio Real Estate Socimi, S.A. owns a portfolio of real estate properties for rent, primarily in the center of Madrid, Barcelona, and the Basque Country, Spain. It manages office and residential buildings, as well as commercial premises. The company has elected to be taxed as a real estate investment trust. As a result, it would not be subject to corporate income tax on that portion of its net income that is distributed to shareholders. The company was founded in 2014 and is based in Madrid, Spain.

YVRS.MC.summary: Elix Vintage Residencial SOCIMI, S.A. invests in, rehabilitates, manages, rents, commercializes, and sells residential buildings in Barcelona and Madrid. The company is based in Madrid, Spain.

YZBL.MC.summary: Zambal Spain Socimi, S.A. operates as a subsidiary of IBA Capital Partners.
